name: Spanky! Demo v0.1
description:
This is a very small slice of the vision I hold for Spanky! 

This demo features the basic core movement mechanics with a playground to test them in, along with a basic AI who will hunt you down. I've tried to crush the bugs I could find but there most certainly will be some I haven't found.

Spanky! is planned to be a quick and exciting multiplayer game with small lobbies (up to 8 - 12 players) and multiple gamemodes each with their own twist while keeping the main focus on those bootyful booties.
Players will play with a chance at unlocking cosmetics after each game and with your support I aim to create a short and fun party sized booty game to the best of my big brain abilities.
